            span: Span {
                line: 1,
                column: 1,
                position: 0,
            },
        },
    ),
    Global(
        GlobalStatement {
            global: Span {
                line: 1,
                column: 7,
                position: 6,
            },
            variables: [
                SimpleVariable(
                    SimpleVariable {
                        span: Span {
                            line: 1,
                            column: 14,
                            position: 13,
                        },
                        name: "$a",
                    },
                ),
                SimpleVariable(
                    SimpleVariable {
                        span: Span {
                            line: 1,
                            column: 18,
                            position: 17,
                        },
                        name: "$b",
                    },
                ),
            ],
        },

]
